about_the_game:
Learning to Bear

Learning to Bear is a puzzle adventure game that combines creative problem-solving, platforming, and exploration in a vibrant and mystical world of floating islands. Step into the paws of Agent Bearden Furr, a humble bear recruited by the Central Bear Intelligence Facility (C.B.I.F.) to unlock the mysteries of the Enochian Cube.

Agent Bearden Furr embarks on the mission of a lifetime. Guided by a quirky assistant, you’ll piece together the secrets of the ancient Island of Roo and its Four Sisters.

Diverse Puzzles and Challenges

Master unique puzzle types, including grinding rails, swinging, physics-based puzzles, mirror challenges, platform puzzles and more. - all designed to test your adaptability and critical thinking -

Dynamic Gameplay

Control 11 unique platform types, each with powerful mechanics like anti-gravity, teleportation, and more. Possess objects, alter gravity, and combine your skills to overcome increasingly complex challenges.

Exploration and Progression

Traverse the Island of Roo and its Four Sister Islands, each offering a unique mix of puzzles, platforming, and breathtaking environments. Restore energy to ancient crystals, unlock the mysteries of the Enochian Cube, and prepare for the final test of the Keeper of Dimensions.


Will you learn to bear?
Join the community and share your experience !

name: Learning to Bear

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400, AMD Ryzen 5 1400, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050Ti, AMD Radeon RX 470 graphics card or better (min 3GB VRAM, DX12 support)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card
  • VR Support: -
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements can´t cover all possible system configurations so issues could occur that avoid or influence the functionality in some cases.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700, AMD Ryzen 7 3800X, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050Ti, AMD Radeon RX 470 graphics card or better (min 3GB VRAM, DX12 support)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card
  • VR Support: -
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements can´t cover all possible system configurations so issues could occur that avoid or influence the functionality in some cases.

short_description: Maneuver unique platforms to conquer 3D puzzles and score goals. Collect runes, decrypt ancient texts, and unlock powerful abilities in this strategy puzzle-action RPG. Soar in a wingsuit, swing, grind rails, and combat enemies as you face a mission filled with unique challenges and puzzles.
